settings.variant-1-description: Whats inside? 5 Cran-Raspberry sticks. 5 Grapefruit Melon, and 5 Blackberry Lemon.
settings.variant-4-description: Our most subtle flavor with only a hint of grapefruit and melon.

settings.step2-text: Just pay Shipping and Handling and we'll send you 15 FREE clean hydration sticks.
settings.step3-text: After 15 days, your flexible hydration plan will start and we'll send you your next order for $24.99. Pause or cancel your plan at any time.

settings.variant1-description: Whats inside? 5 Cran-Raspberry sticks. 5 Grapefruit Melon, and 5 Blackberry Lemon.
settings.variant2-description: A nice mix of berry with a hint of citrus. Our number one selling beverage flavor!
settings.variant3-description: Our most subtle flavor with only a hint of grapefruit and melon.
settings.variant4-description: Our most flavorful option with a classic berry combination.

settings.variant-4-description: Our most subtle flavor with only a hint of grapefruit and melon.

settings.headline: Clean Hydration, Backed by Science
settings.tagline: Not just any science, the gold standard in science, the World Health Organization
settings.step1-text: Sodium, potassium, and magnesium to help your body and mind perform.
settings.step2-text: Plant based organic cane sugar to quickly absorb electrolytes for increased hydration.
settings.step3-text: Basis is backed by science to deliver 3x the hydration of a glass of water alone.

settings.variant1-description: Whats inside? 5 Cran-Raspberry sticks. 5 Grapefruit Melon, and 5 Blackberry Lemon.
settings.variant2-description: A nice mix of berry with a hint of citrus. Our number one selling beverage flavor!
settings.variant3-description: Our most subtle flavor with only a hint of grapefruit and melon.
settings.variant4-description: Our most flavorful option with a classic berry combination.

settings.review_2_quote: Love it! Normally a liquid IV customer but will definitely switch over - enjoying the low sugar and light flavor!

settings.tagline: 20% off on all future orders + free shipping
settings.variant-1-description: A hydration mix made with clean ingredients and 1000mg of electrolytes to help you bounce back from exercise, a night out, or just a long day.
settings.variant-2-description: A hydration mix made with clean ingredients and 1000mg of electrolytes to help you bounce back from exercise, a night out, or just a long day.
settings.variant-3-description: A hydration mix made with clean ingredients and 1000mg of electrolytes to help you bounce back from exercise, a night out, or just a long day.
settings.variant-4-description: A hydration mix made with clean ingredients and 1000mg of electrolytes to help you bounce back from exercise, a night out, or just a long day.

settings.headline: Why subscribe?
settings.point1-text: When you subscribe and join the Basis fam, you save 20% on every single order, forever.
settings.point2-text: Basis subscriptions come with early access to new flavors, a dedicated support channel, and so much more!
settings.point3-text: Easily swap flavors, skip orders, or cancel your subscription anytime.
settings.point4-text: We think you‚Äôll love us. But if you don‚Äôt, just reach out and we‚Äôll take care of you!

settings.headline: Clean hydration, backed by science
settings.tagline: We created Basis using rehydration therapies developed by the World Health Organization, the gold standard in hydration science.
settings.step1-text: Water alone doesn‚Äôt cut it. We have the right balance of magnesium, potassium, and sodium to perfectly rehydrate you.
settings.step2-text: Our sugar has a purpose. Cane sugar or technically speaking, glucose, is needed to absorb the water into the bloodstream quicker, making you feel better, faster.
settings.step3-text: Basis is made with just enough flavoring and no salty aftertaste.

settings.headline: The Reviews are In!
settings.review1-quote: ‚ÄúWe are obsessed with Basis and it will forever be a staple in our household‚Äù
settings.review2-quote: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm floored at how incredible your product is üòÄ and can't believe it took so long for someone to do it, but I'm so glad you are!"

settings.tagline-sub: 20% off on all future orders + free shipping
settings.ni-point1-content: Water alone doesn't cut it. We have the right balance of magnesium, potassium, and sodium to perfectly rehydrate you.
settings.ni-point2-content: Our sugar has a purpose. Cane sugar or technically speaking, glucose, is needed to absorb the water into the bloodstream quicker, making you feel better, faster.
settings.ni-point3-headline: Monk fruit, never Stevia or Erythritol
settings.ni-point3-content: We use Monk Fruit to sweeten our product. A zero caloric sweetener that comes from Southeast Asia.
settings.ni-point4-content: Unlike other products we never add anything that isn't necessary to rehydration, this includes coloring.

settings.compare-headline: Not all hydration is created equal
settings.lifestyle-tagline: Basis was made to replenish electrolytes lost during the day, helping you to feel focused, energized, and relaxed.
settings.science-s1-copy: But without getting too scientific, we created Basis using rehydration therapies developed by the World Health Organization, the gold standard in hydration science. It‚Äôs been tested on elite athletes, gym rats, students, and even our moms.
settings.science-s2-i1-copy: Water alone doesn't cut it. Your body needs the right balance of magnesium, potassium, and sodium to truly hydrate properly.
settings.science-s2-i2-copy: Our sugar has a purpose. Organic cane sugar, or technically speaking, glucose, is needed to absorb the water into the bloodstream quicker, making you feel better, faster.
